column1: Novomichurinsk (Russian: Новомичу́ринск) is a town in Pronsky District of Ryazan Oblast
column3: located on the Pronya River 85 kilometers (53 mi) south of Ryazan
column4: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 19

column1: It was founded in 1968 and granted town status in 1981. It is named after Ivan Vladimirovich Michurin
column2: who was born not far from this town.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: it is incorporated within Pronsky District as the town of district significance of Novomichurinsk. As a municipal division
column3: the town of district significance of Novomichurinsk is incorporated within Pronsky Municipal District as Novomichurinskoye Urban Settlement.

column1: Novomichurinsk is a company town of the Ryazan Power Station.
Рязанская областная Дума. Закон №89-ОЗ от 7 октября 2004 г. «О наделении муниципального образования — Пронский район статусом муниципального района
column2: об установлении его границ и границ муниципальных образований
column4: в ред. Закона №116-ОЗ от 8 октября 2008 г. «Об утверждении границы муниципального образования — Пронский муниципальный район и границ муниципальных образований
column5: входящих в его состав». Вступил в силу со дня официального опубликования. Опубликован: "Рязанские ведомости"
column7: 14 октября 2004 г. (Ryazan Oblast Duma. Law #89-OZ of October 7
column8: 2004 On Granting the Municipal Formation of Pronsky District the Status of a Municipal District
column9: on Establishing Its Borders and the Borders of the Municipal Formations It Comprises
column10: as amended by the Law #116-OZ of October 8
column11: 2008 On Establishing the Border of the Municipal Formation of Pronsky Municipal District and the Borders of the Municipal Formations It Comprises. Effective as of the day of the official publication.).
